column5: This comfy Retreat home is just 5 minutes from The Best Swimming Spot on Canyon Lake! (A few mins from Canyon Lake Dam & free Boat Launch) The Guadalupe River, & 1/2 way between Austin and San Antonio. Great place to get away from it all without sacrificing ease of driving to attractions.  Fish, Float The River, or Just Relax on The Front Porch, and take in the Peace and Serenity that surrounds you! Great for couples, a solo adventure, business travelers, and small families.
column8: Hill Country Retreat at Canyon Lake!!!
